nodes.text: Zdrinbaghs were shelled creatures native to several worlds in the Outer Rim Territories. They were prized for their light and tender meat. Zdrinbaghs had razor sharp teeth, a thick hide, four legs, and four claws.

A shipment of two dozen zdrinbaghs were ordered for Farrimmer Cafe. Shipped live to ensure freshness, the droid chefs of the cafe would deploy stun gas to knock them out for slaughter and preparation. During one incident, the gas was ineffective and the animals escaped into the dining area of the restaurant. The patrons and staff had to fight them off.
